com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

Class EditStoryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.interfaces.AdventureActivity
        • com.uofa.adventure_app.activity.EditStoryActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReturn<Story>

    public class EditStoryActivity
extends AdventureActivity
    Allows the user to edit the title of a story and to see all of the fragements available for that story.
    Author:
    Kevin Lafond
